description:
Everything you need in a pair of hiking shorts, plus a hidden superpower. The durable nylon is rated UPF 40+ to shield you from the sun when you’re trekking with minimal cover, and it dries quickly if you work up a sweat or splash through a creek.

  • Breathable polyester fabric with FlashDry-XD™ technology to keep you dry and cool
  • PFC-free DWR finish for added water repellency
  • Gusseted crotch adds mobility for high steps or leaps across streams
  • Integrated adjustable webbing waistbelt for a personalized fit
  • Fabric provides UPF 40+ sun protection
name: The North Face Paramount Pro Short - Men's
